Arkansas's Premier Signature Developer

Your Signature Is Your Story

With 13+ years blending high-impact styling, brand design, and executive presence, I developed the Script Your Signature™ methodology — a proven process for helping professionals discover and own their authentic style identity.

From Little Rock boardrooms to creative studios nationwide, I guide leaders through transformative style journeys that go far beyond fashion trends. Your signature style becomes your silent spokesperson, communicating your values, expertise, and vision before you even speak.

Personal signature style development for authentic presence
Executive styling and leadership image consulting
Brand identity design and visual strategy
Creative direction for film, editorial, and campaigns

"Style isn't about following trends — it's about scripting your authentic story through every choice you make. When you own your signature, you own the room."

— Cat Phillips

Proprietary Methodology

The Script Your Signature™ Process

A proprietary three-step methodology for developing your authentic signature style that makes you unforgettable.

01

DISCOVER

Uncover Your Authentic Identity

Through intensive consultation and signature assessment, we identify your personal style DNA and professional goals.

02

DESIGN

Craft Your Signature Strategy

We develop your unique visual language and create a comprehensive style strategy that represents who you are.

03

DEFINE

Own Your Signature

You leave with the tools, confidence, and signature presence to make an unforgettable impression.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is Script Your Signature methodology?

Script Your Signature™ is my proprietary 3-step process for developing authentic signature style: Discover your identity, Design your strategy, and Define your presence. This systematic approach helps executives and creatives move beyond trends to develop signature style that supports their professional goals.

How much does personal styling cost in Little Rock?

Personal styling in Little Rock ranges from $350 for signature discovery sessions to $6,000 for executive styling packages. I offer transparent pricing with services including consultation, complete transformations, and executive presence development.
